simulator.leftPane.notSaveScenarioModelI: It seems you have left your scenario unsaved. Continue with following action.
simulator.rightPane.policyDeleteConfirma: Are you sure you want to delete this applied policy?
simulator.listCheckboxErrorMsg: Please select at least one item to share by clicking the list item checkbox
simulator.helpTour.clickOnCountryTab: Click on “Country” tab to see country list
simulator.helpTour.clickOnPolicyTab: Click on “Policies” tab to see policy measures
simulator.helpTour.policyExpender: Click on policy group expander icon (+) to expand group
simulator.helpTour.clickOnApplyPolicy: Click on ”Apply Policy” to apply policy
simulator.helpTour.expendRightPanel: Expand right panel to view applied policies
simulator.helpTour.saveScenarioButton: Click on ”Save Scenario” button to save scenario
simulator.helpTour.clickCompareScenarioW: Click ”Compare” button to compare Scenario with Baseline
simulator.helpTour.openScenarioAnalysis: Open ”Scenario Analysis” pane to compare between Baseline and scenario(s)
simulator.helpTour.clickDownloadPdf: Click ”Download PDF” to download data and graph in PDF format
simulator.helpTour.clickShareByEmail: Click ”Share by email” to send data and graph via email
